pages.text: Scrying utilizes the Experience yield from a victim to increase the amount of souls ($(#630000)Evolution Points) harvested when they die from a parasite. The Experience yield, however, is not diminished by this process, and the exact way this happens is still disputed.

$(#630000)It also increases the amount of biomass obtained when they die. This effect is quite useful, and I should be able to apply it with a Brew Sac. I should be careful to apply it before any harming effects, similarly to my approach to Viral.
